content:
ICS 1P, Introduction to Computing

Spring 1996 --- David G. Kay

This course meets Tuesdays and Thursdays, 2:00 to 3:30, in Engineering Lecture Hall 100.

Three sample files are available for the Web Publishing lab assignment:

  • A short sample file illustrating some common HTML tags (sample.html)
  • The file we created as a demonstration in class.
  • A model file you can adapt to create your own home page (index.html)
David G. Kay, 408E Computer Science
Department of Information and Computer Science, University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425. (714) 824-5072 --- Fax (714) 824-4056 --- Email kay@uci.edu
